duties_responsibilities.duty: Conducting client research and organizing leads
Performing client outreach via emails, phone calls, and meeting requests
Maintaining and updating the firm’s CRM as needed
Attending meetings, recording notes, and distributing to team members
Managing CEO’s calendars, assisting with scheduling, and arranging travel when requested
Organizing special events for the company, including an annual retreat
Performing light personal assistant tasks (running errands, scheduling appointments, etc.)

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field
